text: I just found out I saved my friends life  Today we were in English and we were watching a documentary about how social media affects us and it went to the topic of suicide  My friend mustered up the courage to tell everyone that hes cut himself before  He said that me and our friends saved him by just being there for him  I didn t realize how much being this close to losing a friend felt and it s the worst feeling I ve ever felt in my life and I ve been through some shit  You may not think your friends are suicidal but please even if there s a slight chance or signals PLEASE make them feel loved  I know this seems like another karma whore post but I promise you it s not  PLEASE and I BEG you please check on your friends because you may not get as lucky as me  If you re going thinking about self harm or suicide please talk to your friends or a trusted adult or call   Your friends and family love you so much even if you don t realize it
summary: I saved my friend's life by being there for him when he cut himself. I didn't realize how close to losing a friend I had been to suicide. If you're thinking about self harm or suicide, talk to your friends or a trusted adult.
